body: You distort the space around a creature, twisting the path of its melee attacks unpredictably, but always toward a nearby creature that the target threatens. Until the start of your next turn, melee attacks made by the target creature affect a random target instead of their intended target.
description: Targeted creature's attacks target a random square instead of the intended target.

components.text: a length of wire bent into a circle

component_text: V, S, M (a length of wire bent into a circle)
name: Twisted Space
